title: [GAMEPLAY]  Braum voice muted while playing El Tigre skin

replies.body:
Hey there! 

Sorry about this! Looks like he's been taking lessons from Sona. D: In all seriousness, this is a known issue, and we're working on a fix!
What did you do to traumatize Braum to stay mute?? >=C You took his own chair and beat him with it, didn't you. I bet you did

D; I would never!!! Him and i are like brothers! All my life when i was playing video games.  Their were two favorites I always Loved about my main character in a game. Whether it be RPG or something else.  I loved a character with ice powers. and I loved a character with a  shield.

Braum can give me both

So you didn't like it when he replaced shield with a chair, and you beat him with the chair. Like "WHY DID YOU GET RID OF YOUR SHIELD THAT I LOVED. WHY DID YOU GET A CHAIR INSTEAD". Now forever mute. RIP.
